pear_cactus_seeds.description: Learn to grow prickly pear cacti.

juniper_tree_crop.description: Need logs? These tall trees can help if you lack space.

000.name: Juniper Berry
000.description: Even a mighty tree has humble beginnings.

002.name: Juniper Tree Sprout
002.description: Reach for the sun, little juniperling.

003.name: Juniper Tree Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

pine_tree_crop.description: Winter is coming? Now you can have as many pine trees as you want.

000.name: Pine Cone
000.description: Even a mighty tree has humble beginnings.

002.name: Pine Tree Sprout
002.description: Perfect size for a baby mammooth.

003.name: Pine Tree Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

cactus_tree_crop.description: Need wood? These cacti grow slowly but require very little space.

000.name: Tree Cactus Seed
000.description: Even a mighty cactus has humble beginnings.

003.name: Tree Cactus Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

berry_bush_crop.description: Plant some berry bushes if you need berries

000.name: Dried Berries
000.description: Be patient, plants need time to grow.

002.name: Berry Bush Sprout
002.description: I can almost smell the berries.

003.name: Berry Bush Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

pear_cactus_crop.description: Plant some prickly pear cacti if you need more fruit.

000.name: Dried Prickly Pears
000.description: Be patient, plants need time to grow.

003.name: Prickly Pear Cactus Sapling
003.description: Ready to be transferred to a bigger plot.

tumbleweed_crop.description: This plant's fiber can be spun into thread

000.name: Tumbleweed Seedling
000.description: Still a long way to grow.

003.name: Immature Tumbleweed
003.description: Still not dry enough for weaving.

wooden_window_box_recipe.description: Empty, but Herbalist can bring some life to it

clay_window_box_recipe.description: Empty, but Herbalist can bring some life to it
clay_window_box_recipe.flavor: Plants don't appear out of nowhere.

clay_pot_small_recipe.flavor: Plants don't appear out of nowhere.

wooden_window_brightbell_recipe.description: A planter box full of brightbell flowers, built to be placed below window frames.
wooden_window_brightbell_recipe.flavor: A brightbell a day keeps the Ogres away!

wooden_window_frostsnap_recipe.description: A planter box full of Frostsnap flowers, built to be placed below window frames.
wooden_window_frostsnap_recipe.flavor: The capstone of a civilized dwelling.

wooden_window_cactus_recipe.description: Plant a cactus in a wooden box.

clay_window_cactus_recipe.description: Plant a cactus in a clay box.

clay_window_brightbell_recipe.description: A planter box full of brightbell flowers, formed to be placed below window frames.
clay_window_brightbell_recipe.flavor: A brightbell a day keeps the bugs away!

clay_window_frostsnap_recipe.description: A planter box full of Frostsnap flowers, formed to be placed below window frames.
clay_window_frostsnap_recipe.flavor: The capstone of a civilized dwelling.

clay_window_foxlily_recipe.description: A planter box full of fox lilies, formed to be placed below window frames.
clay_window_foxlily_recipe.flavor: Traders brought these fox lilies from far away.

clay_window_silkweed_recipe.description: A planter box full of silkweed, formed to be placed below window frames.
clay_window_silkweed_recipe.flavor: The decorative silkweed variety is a bit smaller.

clay_window_tumbleweed_recipe.description: A planter box full of tumbleweed, formed to be placed below window frames.
clay_window_tumbleweed_recipe.flavor: Still better than an empty box.

wooden_window_foxlily_recipe.description: A planter box full of fox lilies, built to be placed below window frames.
wooden_window_foxlily_recipe.flavor: Traders brought these fox lilies from far away.

wooden_window_silkweed_recipe.description: A planter box full of silkweed, built to be placed below window frames.
wooden_window_silkweed_recipe.flavor: The decorative silkweed variety is a bit smaller.

wooden_window_tumbleweed_recipe.description: A planter box full of tumbleweed, built to be placed below window frames.
wooden_window_tumbleweed_recipe.flavor: Still better than an empty box.

bed_brightbell_recipe.description: Brightbells will regrow slowly allowing new plants to be collected by the Herbalist.
bed_brightbell_recipe.flavor: A brightbell a day keeps the bugs away!

bed_frostsnap_recipe.description: Frostsnaps will regrow slowly allowing new plants to be collected by the Herbalist.
bed_frostsnap_recipe.flavor: The capstone of a civilized dwelling.

bed_cactus_flower_recipe.description: Cacti will regrow slowly allowing new plants to be collected by the Herbalist.

bed_silkweed_recipe.description: Silkweed will regrow slowly allowing new plants to be collected by the Herbalist.
bed_silkweed_recipe.flavor: Manually harvesting fiber plants is the only way of obtaining fiber early on.
